summary: On the sidewalks of the London theater district the buskers (street performers) earn enough coins for a cheap room. Charles (Charles Laughton), who recites dramatic monologues, sees that a ... See full summary »
cast: Charles Laughton|Vivien Leigh|Rex Harrison|Larry Adler|Tyrone Guthrie|Maire O'Neill|Gus McNaughton|Polly Ward|Basil Gill|Helen Haye|David Burns|Phyllis Stanley|Edward Lexy|Clare Greet|Alf Goddard|Cyril Smith|Romilly Lunge|Ronald Ward|Carroll Gibbons and His Orchestra|The Luna Boys|Clifford Buckton|Bartlett Cormack|Carroll Gibbons|Edie Martin|Ronald Shiner|John Singer|Jerry Verno
title: Callejón sin salida
